details: I am a frontend engineer with 6+ years of software development experience and a passion for UI/UX design and well-documented code.
I have practical experience building web apps from the ground up, ranging from simple static sites to production-level government apps using a range of technologies.
I am also an intrinsically motivated team player and expert communicator, aspiring to combine broad background and strong technical skills to see products grow and succeed.
In my free time, I love to travel, hike, work on my digital art, explore new breweries and eateries, and just relax with my wife, Rachel, our dog, Tori, and our rabbit, Binny (Binary).
